name: The Bloody Road
description:
Violent game about charging through hordes of enemies using only your sword, gun.... and magic! Collect Blood of your enemies and even your own, into vials using Pentagram spell. You can spend collected resource to cast powerfull spells! Cover your blade in blood to empower your attacks! Be cauctious, Some enemies are tougher than they seem.

http://globalgamejam.org/2016/games/bloody-road
